file.content:
{
  "name": "splice-v3",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Adobe Premiere Pro UXP Plugin with selection tools and AI services integration",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "tsc && vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "test": "vitest",
    "test:ui": "vitest --ui",
    "test:coverage": "vitest run --coverage",
    "test:e2e": "playwright test",
    "test:e2e:ui": "playwright test --ui",
    "test:all": "npm run test && npm run test:e2e",
    "lint": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx",
    "lint:fix": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --fix",
    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.{ts,tsx,css}\"",
    "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit",
    "uxp:watch": "uxp plugin watch dist",
    "uxp:load": "uxp plugin load dist/manifest.json",
    "uxp:reload": "uxp plugin reload",
    "uxp:debug": "uxp plugin debug",
    "uxp:package": "uxp plugin package",
    "prepare": "husky"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "adobe",
    "uxp",
    "premiere-pro",
    "plugin",
    "spectrum",
    "typescript"
  ],
  "author": "",
  "license": "UNLICENSED",
  "dependencies": {
    "@spectrum-web-components/action-button": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/button": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/checkbox": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/dialog": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/icons-workflow": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/menu": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/picker": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/progress-circle": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/textfield": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/theme": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/toast": "^0.42.0",
    "lit": "^3.2.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@adobe/cc-ext-uxp-types": "^7.3.1",
    "@eslint/js": "^9.39.2",
    "@playwright/test": "^1.49.1",
    "@types/node": "^22.10.2",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.18.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.18.0",
    "@vitest/coverage-v8": "^2.1.8",
    "@vitest/ui": "^2.1.8",
    "eslint": "^9.17.0",
    "globals": "^15.14.0",
    "husky": "^9.1.7",
    "lint-staged": "^15.2.11",
    "prettier": "^3.4.2",
    "typescript": "^5.7.2",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.50.0",
    "vite": "^6.0.5",
    "vitest": "^2.1.8"
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "*.{ts,tsx}": [
      "eslint --fix",
      "prettier --write"
    ],
    "*.{json,md,css}": [
      "prettier --write"
    ]
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=20.0.0"
  }
}

1→# Splice v3
     2→
     3→Adobe Premiere Pro UXP Plugin with selection tools and AI-powered editing features.
     4→
     5→## Features
     6→
     7→- **Selection Tools**: Advanced clip selection with time range and track selection
     8→- **AI-Powered Analysis**: Scene detection, smart cut suggestions, audio analysis
     9→- **Freemium Model**: 10 free AI operations, upgrade for unlimited access
    10→- **Spectrum Web Components**: Native Adobe design system UI
    11→
    12→## Requirements
    13→
    14→- Adobe Premiere Pro 25.6+
    15→- UXP Developer Tool 2.2+
    16→- Node.js 20+
    17→
    18→## Development
    19→
    20→```bash
    21→# Install dependencies
    22→npm install
    23→
    24→# Start development server
    25→npm run dev
    26→
    27→# Run unit tests
    28→npm test
    29→
    30→# Run e2e tests
    31→npm run test:e2e
    32→
    33→# Type check
    34→npm run typecheck
    35→
    36→# Lint
    37→npm run lint
    38→
    39→# Build for production
    40→npm run build
    41→```
    42→
    43→## Plugin Development
    44→
    45→```bash
    46→# Start UXP Developer Tool service
    47→uxp service start
    48→
    49→# Load plugin
    50→npm run uxp:load
    51→
    52→# Watch for changes
    53→npm run uxp:watch
    54→
    55→# Debug plugin
    56→npm run uxp:debug
    57→
    58→# Package for distribution
    59→npm run uxp:package
    60→```
    61→
    62→## Project Structure
    63→
    64→```
    65→splice-v3/
    66→├── src/
    67→│   ├── components/     # Lit Web Components
    68→│   │   ├── common/     # Shared UI components
    69→│   │   └── panels/     # Main plugin panels
    70→│   ├── hooks/          # Custom hooks (if using)
    71→│   ├── utils/          # Utility functions
    72→│   │   ├── api/        # API wrappers
    73→│   │   └── helpers/    # Pure helper functions
    74→│   ├── types/          # TypeScript type definitions
    75→│   ├── context/        # Global context/state
    76→│   ├── styles/         # Global CSS & design tokens
    77→│   └── config/         # Plugin configuration
    78→├── tests/
    79→│   ├── unit/           # Vitest unit tests
    80→│   ├── e2e/            # Playwright e2e tests
    81→│   └── __mocks__/      # Test mocks
    82→├── public/
    83→│   ├── manifest.json   # UXP plugin manifest
    84→│   ├── index.html      # Plugin entry HTML
    85→│   └── icons/          # Plugin icons
    86→└── dist/               # Built plugin (generated)
    87→```
    88→
    89→## AI Service Configuration
    90→
    91→Configure your AI provider in Settings:
    92→
    93→- **Anthropic Claude**: Get API key from console.anthropic.com
    94→- **OpenAI GPT**: Get API key from platform.openai.com
    95→- **Google Gemini**: Get API key from makersuite.google.com
    96→
    97→## Distribution
    98→
    99→1. Package plugin: `npm run uxp:package`
   100→2. Submit to [Adobe Exchange](https://exchange.adobe.com)
   101→3. Follow Adobe's review process
   102→
   103→## License
   104→
   105→UNLICENSED - Proprietary
   106→

file.content:
# Splice v3

Adobe Premiere Pro UXP Plugin with selection tools and AI-powered editing features.

## Features

- **Selection Tools**: Advanced clip selection with time range and track selection
- **AI-Powered Analysis**: Scene detection, smart cut suggestions, audio analysis
- **Freemium Model**: 10 free AI operations, upgrade for unlimited access
- **Spectrum Web Components**: Native Adobe design system UI

## Requirements

- Adobe Premiere Pro 25.6+
- UXP Developer Tool 2.2+
- Node.js 20+

## Development

```bash
# Install dependencies
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev

# Run unit tests
npm test

# Run e2e tests
npm run test:e2e

# Type check
npm run typecheck

# Lint
npm run lint

# Build for production
npm run build
```

## Plugin Development

```bash
# Start UXP Developer Tool service
uxp service start

# Load plugin
npm run uxp:load

# Watch for changes
npm run uxp:watch

# Debug plugin
npm run uxp:debug

# Package for distribution
npm run uxp:package
```

## Project Structure

```
splice-v3/
├── src/
│   ├── components/     # Lit Web Components
│   │   ├── common/     # Shared UI components
│   │   └── panels/     # Main plugin panels
│   ├── hooks/          # Custom hooks (if using)
│   ├── utils/          # Utility functions
│   │   ├── api/        # API wrappers
│   │   └── helpers/    # Pure helper functions
│   ├── types/          # TypeScript type definitions
│   ├── context/        # Global context/state
│   ├── styles/         # Global CSS & design tokens
│   └── config/         # Plugin configuration
├── tests/
│   ├── unit/           # Vitest unit tests
│   ├── e2e/            # Playwright e2e tests
│   └── __mocks__/      # Test mocks
├── public/
│   ├── manifest.json   # UXP plugin manifest
│   ├── index.html      # Plugin entry HTML
│   └── icons/          # Plugin icons
└── dist/               # Built plugin (generated)
```

## AI Service Configuration

Configure your AI provider in Settings:

- **Anthropic Claude**: Get API key from console.anthropic.com
- **OpenAI GPT**: Get API key from platform.openai.com
- **Google Gemini**: Get API key from makersuite.google.com

## Distribution

1. Package plugin: `npm run uxp:package`
2. Submit to [Adobe Exchange](https://exchange.adobe.com)
3. Follow Adobe's review process

## License

UNLICENSED - Proprietary

content.text:
Perfect! I have all the information needed. Let me compile a comprehensive folder structure map.

## Project Structure Map - Splice v3

This is an **Adobe Premiere Pro UXP Plugin** built with TypeScript, Lit Web Components, and Vite. Here's the complete folder structure breakdown:

### Root Level Configuration Files
- **package.json** - Dependencies and build scripts (Node 20+, Vite, Vitest, Playwright)
- **tsconfig.json** - TypeScript configuration
- **vite.config.ts** - Vite build configuration
- **vitest.config.ts** - Unit test configuration (Vitest)
- **playwright.config.ts** - E2E test configuration
- **eslint.config.js** - ESLint rules
- **.prettierrc** - Code formatting configuration
- **.env.example** - Environment variables template
- **README.md** - Project documentation

### Key Directories

#### /src - Main Application Source Code
The core plugin implementation written in TypeScript with Lit Web Components:

**src/index.ts** - Application entry point

**src/components/** - UI Components (Lit Web Components)
- **panels/** - Main plugin interface panels
  - `PluginApp.ts` - Root panel component
  - `index.ts` - Panel exports
  
- **common/** - Reusable UI components
  - `Header.ts` - Plugin header with branding
  - `SelectionPanel.ts` - Clip/segment selection interface
  - `AIToolsPanel.ts` - AI-powered analysis tools (scene detection, smart cuts, audio analysis)
  - `SettingsPanel.ts` - Configuration and API key management
  - `UpgradePrompt.ts` - Freemium upgrade dialog (10 free operations)
  - `index.ts` - Component exports

**src/types/** - TypeScript Type Definitions
- `plugin.ts` - Plugin-specific types and interfaces
- `api.ts` - API request/response types
- `premiere.ts` - Adobe Premiere Pro API types
- `ui.ts` - UI component prop types
- `index.ts` - Type exports

**src/utils/** - Utility Functions and Helpers
- `logger.ts` - Logging utility for debugging
- `index.ts` - Utils exports
  
- **api/** - External API Integration
  - `plugin.ts` - Plugin state and communication APIs
  - `premiere.ts` - Adobe Premiere Pro SDK wrapper (clip selection, track management)
  - `ai-service.ts` - AI provider integration (Claude, OpenAI, Gemini)
  - `index.ts` - API exports
  
- **helpers/** - Pure Helper Functions
  - `formatters.ts` - Data formatting (timecodes, durations, file sizes)
  - `validators.ts` - Input validation (URLs, API keys, clip ranges)
  - `index.ts` - Helper exports

**src/styles/** - Global Styling
- `globals.css` - Global CSS, design tokens, Spectrum Web Components theming

#### /tests - Automated Testing
Test infrastructure for unit and end-to-end testing:

**tests/setup.ts** - Test environment configuration

**tests/unit/utils/** - Unit Tests (Vitest)
- `formatters.test.ts` - Tests for formatting utilities
- `validators.test.ts` - Tests for validation utilities

**tests/e2e/** - End-to-End Tests (Playwright)
- `plugin.spec.ts` - Plugin workflow integration tests

**tests/__mocks__/** - Test Mocks
- `photoshop.ts` - Mock Adobe UXP/Photoshop API
- `uxp.ts` - Mock UXP platform APIs

#### /public - Static Assets & Plugin Manifest
Plugin distribution files and UI assets:

- **index.html** - Plugin entry HTML (loads Lit components)
- **manifest.json** - UXP plugin metadata (permissions, version, name)
- **icons/** - Plugin icons for Premiere Pro UI
  - `icon-48.png` - 48x48 plugin icon
  - `icon-24.png` - 24x24 plugin icon

#### /.git - Version Control
Git repository with initial commit

#### /.claude - Claude Configuration
IDE/editor configuration for Claude Code

#### /.husky - Git Hooks
Pre-commit hooks for linting and formatting

### Technology Stack Summary
- **Framework**: Lit Web Components v3.2.1
- **Build Tool**: Vite v6.0.5
- **Language**: TypeScript 5.7.2
- **UI Components**: Spectrum Web Components v0.42.0 (Adobe Design System)
- **Testing**: Vitest 2.1.8 (unit), Playwright 1.49.1 (e2e)
- **Code Quality**: ESLint 9.17.0, Prettier 3.4.2
- **Plugin API**: Adobe CC Extension UXP Types v7.3.1

### Build Outputs
- **dist/** (generated) - Compiled plugin ready for Adobe Premiere Pro loading and distribution

This project follows a clean, modular architecture with clear separation between components, utilities, types, and tests, making it maintainable and testable for Adobe Premiere Pro plugin development.
